name: Reefworld Fly / Cruise
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Great Barrier Reef and the Whitsundays with the Reefworld Fly / Cruise tour. This unique adventure combines the thrill of a scenic helicopter flight with the relaxation of a cruise, offering stunning views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet, and Heart Reef. Perfect for adventure seekers and nature lovers, this tour provides a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to explore one of the world's most remarkable natural wonders.
includes:
Scenic helicopter flight with views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet, and Heart Reef
2.0 hours at Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld
Snorkeling gear and wetsuits
Lunch provided by Cruise Whitsundays
Cruise back through the Whitsundays
highlights:
Scenic helicopter flight over the Whitsundays
Explore the Great Barrier Reef
Snorkeling opportunities at Reefworld
Relaxing cruise back to Airlie Beach
Views of iconic landmarks like Whitehaven Beach and Heart Reef
locations: Airlie Beach,Daydream Island,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Hill Inlet,Reefworld,Whitehaven

name: Helireef Whitehaven Beach Helicopter Tour
description: Experience the Whitsundays like never before with a breathtaking helicopter flight to Whitehaven Beach. This 2-hour adventure is perfect for those seeking a luxurious and unique way to explore one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Enjoy stunning aerial views of the Whitsunday Islands and fringing reefs before landing on Whitehaven Beach. Relax on the pristine sands with chilled sparkling wine and water, capturing unforgettable photographs and video footage. Ideal for couples and small groups looking for an exclusive, memorable experience.
includes:
Helicopter flight to Whitehaven Beach
75-minute stopover at Whitehaven Beach
Chilled sparkling wine and water
Safety briefing
Beach gear
highlights:
Scenic helicopter flight over Whitsunday Islands
75 minutes on Whitehaven Beach
Breathtaking aerial views of fringing reefs
Relax with sparkling wine and water
Perfect for photography and video
locations: Daydream Island,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
